salesCareers.title: Sales Careers
salesCareers.subtitle: Join our dynamic sales team
salesCareers.description: We're looking for passionate sales professionals who can help our clients leverage cutting-edge IT solutions for their businesses. Our commission-based compensation structure offers great earning potential for motivated individuals.
salesCareers.howToApply: Interested in applying? Fill out the form below with your qualifications and experience.

salesRep.title: Sales Representative
salesRep.description: Sales Representatives are the primary contact point for our clients, helping them understand how our services can solve their business challenges.
requirements: 1-2 years of experience in B2B sales (IT industry experience is a plus)

salesManager.title: Sales Manager
salesManager.description: Sales Managers lead our sales team, develop sales strategies, and help maximize the team's performance while maintaining key client relationships.
requirements: 3+ years of experience in sales management, preferably in the IT sector
Proven track record of meeting or exceeding sales targets
Experience building and managing sales teams
Strategic thinking and excellent leadership skills
Bachelor's degree in Business, Marketing, or related field

accountManager.title: Key Account Manager
accountManager.description: Key Account Managers build and maintain relationships with our most valuable clients, ensuring their continued satisfaction and identifying opportunities for growth.
requirements: 3+ years of account management experience in the IT industry
Strong understanding of client relationship management
Ability to understand complex technical concepts and translate them for clients
